title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.18 - Change of location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.18 - Change of location

State Regulations
A licensee seeking to change the location of one of its
offices must give written notice to the superintendent at least 30 days prior
to such change. The notice shall: (a) state the reason(s) for the change; (b) provide a projection of any increased
expenses which may be incurred; and
(c) state the extent, if any, to which the
licensee intends to increase fees to its debtors as a result of the change in
location. If the superintendent determines that there is no
reasonable objection to such change of location, the superintendent shall
attach a rider to the license setting forth the change in
location. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
402.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
